The next day, I woke up earlier than usual and\nnervously paced around my room.%K%P
'I wonder if this is okay.'%K%P
I checked how I looked for the umpteenth time\nand checked the time on my phone.\nIt was still a little early.%K%P
'I can't make her wait for me.'%K%P
I checked my clothes one last time, then\nleft the apartments.%K%P
'Our first date... I'm so nervous.'%K%P
We'd gone places together before, but never\nas a couple.%K%P
I hoped Akane would enjoy herself.%K%P
'Sorry to keep you waiting!'%K%P
Akane came flying out of nowhere, taking me\nby surprise.%K%P
'No, you're right on time.'%K%P
The old Akane probably would have been late.%K%P
It was a little thing, but it really showed how much\nshe had progressed.%K%P
'Oh, I saw you waiting and thought I was late again.'%K%P
'You didn't need to rush.\nI wouldn't have been mad if you were late.'%K%P
'Yeah, but it would bother me.\nI'd feel bad if I made you wait.'%K%P
'Well, I see what you're saying, but...'%K%P
I remembered that it was our first date, and took\na good look at Akane.%K%P
She was wearing her regular clothes, but for some\nreason she looked a hundred times cuter.%K%P
'Wh-What? Is my hair messed up?\nIs something wrong?'%K%P
'No, not at all. Just the opposite. You look even\ncuter than you usually do.'%K%P
'Huh?! But this is what I always wear!'%K%P
'No, really, you look wonderful.'%K%P
'Heehee, awww. Thanks for saying so.'%K%P
'And...you look even better than usual, too.'%K%P
Akane said to me shyly, her face red.\nI felt so embarrassed I looked away.%K%P
'Oh, you're hiding your face!'%K%P
'W-Well, you know. It's hard not to get embarrassed\nwhen you tell me I look good right to my face.\nSorry, I didn't mean anything.'%K%P
'I just said it because it's true.\nAnyway, here.'%K%P
She held out her hand.%K%P
So that was what she wanted.%K%P
'Like this?'%K%P
I twined my fingers in hers and held her hand.%K%P
'Heehee, yah!'%K%P
'Wha?!'%K%P
Grasping my hand, Akane gave me a jerk and suddenly\nwe were arm in arm.%K%P
'Like this!'%K%P
It was so sudden.%K%P
But, now I could enjoy the feel of her even more,\nand despite the embarrassment it was fantastic.%K%P
'S-So then... Off we go!'%K%P

'Yeah!'
It tastes good, but best of all is
Arm in arm, Akane and I made our way to
the shopping street.%K%P
When we got there, people on the street saw us\nwith our arms linked like that and yelled out at us.\nIt really ruined the mood.%K%P
To them, Akane only said...%K%P
'Sho's finally fallen for my irresistible charms!'%K%P
I just listened with a wry smile as Akane yelled\nout gleefully at my side.%K%P
The people passing by finally settled down,\nand we got a break.%K%P
'Ugh, the people around here are real gossips.\nHuh? Are you okay, Akane?'%K%P
Akane was frowning unhappily.%K%P
'Never mind. I just feel like an idiot being the\nonly one to say anything.'%K%P
'Sorry. I didn't mean to leave you hanging,\nI was just kind of embarrassed.'%K%P
'We're a couple now, I just thought you'd back\nme up, or show me you cared.'%K%P
'I'm really sorry.'%K%P
'Do you feel bad about it?'%K%P
'Of course I do.'%K%P
'Okay then. Kiss me and I'll forgive you.'%K%P
Akane closed her eyes and puckered her small,\npink mouth, bringing her face close to mine.%K%P
B-But a kiss, right there in front of everyone?!%K%P
'Um... I can't right here, but is this good enough?'%K%P
Instead of a kiss, I gave her a gentle pet on the\nhead, and Akane broke out in a smile.%K%P
'Mm... Eheh... Okay, yes, fine, I forgive you.'%K%P
Looked like I got off easy.%K%P
'But you really are amazing.'%K%P
'Why, all of a sudden?'%K%P
'All those people calling out to you like that,\nbeing so nice. It's so rare.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'Yeah. They all must like you so much.'%K%P
'I thought it was normal. It's not?'%K%P
'Well, people don't check up on those they\ndon't like.'%K%P
'Huh... I never noticed before, but I guess lots of\npeople have been really nice to me.'%K%P
This realization seemed to make her happy,\nand her face beamed.%K%P
Seeing her like that made me happy, too.%K%P
'So is there anywhere in particular\nyou'd like to check out?'%K%P
'Not really, no. Just walking next to you like\nthis is plenty fun.'%K%P
'Okay then, can I recommend a cafe?'%K%P
'Go ahead!'%K%P
It looked like Akane was interested.%K%P
'A cafe, huh? Sounds nice!\nThis will be my first time!'%K%P
'That place has the best desserts,\nparfaits and stuff.\nI think you'll like it.'%K%P
'Parfaits! Oh, yeah! Come on, let's hurry!'%K%P
'H-Hey! Stop pulling! Jeez.'%K%P
I couldn't help speeding up as Akane pulled me along.%K%P
'So this is your recommendation...'%K%P
The staff showed us to our seats, and Akane\ntook in the shop interior.%K%P
'It's got nice ambiance!'%K%P
'They really take care with their decorating.'%K%P
One thing I like about this shop is how they use\nscreens and bamboo table settings to create\nan old Japanese feeling.%K%P
'The menu's got sweet bean soup, syrup dumplings,\nsweet buns, green tea parfaits... Oh wow.'%K%P
Akane scanned the menu intently.%K%P
As I looked at her, she raised her eyes and\nour gazes met.%K%P
'Do you know what you're getting?'%K%P
'I'm getting the sweet bean soup with dumplings.'%K%P
'Oh, that sounds good!'%K%P
'How about you?'%K%P
'Oh, I want to eat it all, I just can't decide.\nHm... What do you recommend?'%K%P
'I think I'd recommend the green tea waffles.\nThey come with ice cream and chestnuts, so good.'%K%P
'Waffles, huh... Anything else?'%K%P
'The parfait, I guess. It's kind of expensive,\nbut it's really big so it'll fill you up.'%K%P
'I see... Oh!'%K%P
Akane froze in the middle of flipping through\nthe menu.%K%P
Clearly, she found something she liked.%K%P
'Did you decide?'%K%P
'Yeah! I found the perfect thing for the moment.\nExcuse me! Yes, I'll have this!'%K%P
As soon as she decided, Akane ordered for\nherself, ignoring me.%K%P
'Whoa, hey, what about me?'%K%P
'Don't worry about it, trust me!'%K%P
She had a huge grin on her face.%K%P
I suddenly had a bad feeling.%K%P
'Ah. Now I see...'%K%P
Our order came after a few minutes.%K%P
Sitting before me was the\n'Pudding and Strawberry Lovey-Dovey\nMerry-Go-Round Parfait For Lovers Only.'%K%P
It was about twice as big as a regular\nparfait, was decorated with heart-shaped chocolates,\nand came with two spoons.%K%P
'I decided as soon as I saw it.\nIt looks so yummy, and best of all,\nwe can eat it together!'%K%P
'Yeah, with this much, I certainly didn't need\nto order anything else.'%K%P
And if I even tried to eat anything more,\nI was sure I'd get heartburn from all the sugar.%K%P
'Right? Come on, let's eat! Say aaah!'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
I froze, staring at the spoon Akane was\nholding out.%K%P
'What's wrong?'%K%P
'Oh, just... I can feed myself, you know.'%K%P
'No no no, this is a couple's parfait, we've got\nto feed each other!'%K%P
'And remember, you fed me when I was\nfeeling sick!'%K%P
'Th-That was different, it didn't mean--'%K%P
'Enough arguing! Take that!'%K%P
'Mph!'%K%P
Akane stuffed the spoon in my mouth and I\nswallowed by reflex. The sweet cream and\nmild sourness of strawberries filled my mouth.%K%P
'It's good...'%K%P
'Heheh... Now it's your turn!'%K%P
'...Do I have to?'%K%P
'Of course! Come on, aaah!'%K%P
Akane closed her eyes and opened her delicate mouth.%K%P
Oh well. I resigned myself.%K%P
'Aaahhh...'%K%P
I scooped up some parfait and put it in her\ncute little mouth.%K%P
'Mmm! It's good! So good!'%K%P
'It tastes good, but best of all, you fed it to me.\n It made it even tastier!'%K%P
Man, oh man.%K%P
How could she be so adorable?%K%P
'Okay, now it's my turn. Say aaah!'%K%P
She scooped some more and held the spoon out.%K%P
Yeah, it was clear I couldn't get out of it.%K%P
I gave up and opened my mouth.%K%P
'Aaah... Mmmm.\nIt's not as sweet as I thought it'd be,\nbut it's really easy to eat.'%K%P
'Right? You can just keep eating forever!\nSo, here, aaaah!'%K%P
'We're going to keep doing this?'%K%P
'Of course! Hurry up!'%K%P
While she urged me on, I continued feeding her,\nfeeling a kind of desperation.%K%P
At first I had been embarrassed,\nbut that feeling dulled as time went on\nand now I was feeding her steadily.%K%P
'Say a-- Oh! Rats.'%K%P
The ice cream she'd scooped up was melting and\nsome dripped from her spoon onto her chest.%K%P
'Are you okay?'%K%P
'Yes, it didn't get on my clothes.\nBut what a waste...\nOh! Sho, why don't you lick it off?'%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
'Just for you!\nGo ahead, lick away!'%K%P
Akane lifter her breast alluringly, showing me\nwhere to lick.%K%P
Staring at the cream resting on her trembling skin,\nI felt temptation breaking through my reason.%K%P
'Come on, what's the matter?'%K%P
Her teasing tone of voice planted a seed of\nresistance.%K%P
I knew she'd just keep going like that, so...%K%P
'Okay then, let me just get closer...'%K%P
'What's wrong? You said I should lick it off!'%K%P
'Th-That was just a little joke! I was just teasing.\nwe're out here in front of everybody,\nso we should save that for home!'%K%P
Once I'd begun my counterattack, Akane's face\nhad gone beet red.%K%P
'Now hold still so I can lick you.'%K%P
'S-Stop! No! Forget what I said! Forget it!'%K%P
As I started to lean over the table,\nAkane grabbed a napkin and quickly\nwiped the ice cream away.%K%P
'Oh, I never expected you to come back at\n my teasing like that!'%K%P
Akane muttered, red faced, looking like she\nwanted to disappear in her chair.%K%P
'Now you know not to tease me like that.'%K%P
'But...you're blushing, too.'%K%P
'Quiet, you!'%K%P
I had to admit, though, my heart was pounding\nand my face felt hot. I wasn't used to this.%K%P
'L-Let's hurry up and finish this.'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
We ate the rest of our parfait, both fiercely\nblushing.%K%P
The time flew by, we were having so much fun.%K%P
After we left the cafe, we wandered through the\nshopping street and stopped at the park.\nIt was evening before we knew it.%K%P
We walked back to Tsubaki, still arm-in-arm,\nbut somehow more comfortable than before.%K%P
'Today was so much fun!\nLet's go again soon.'%K%P
'We can go as many times as you want.'%K%P
'Great, let's go to that cafe again!\nNext time, I'll get the waffles you recommended.'%K%P
We walked and talked about the day,\nand as Akane looked over Kannagi,\nshe said...%K%P
'Today, so many people asked about me...'%K%P
'I never thought about what it meant\nbefore today...'%K%P
'I mean, I was always talking to people,\nnot even thinking about it,\nso I thought that was normal.'%K%P
'But today I got it, when all those people\nwere so nice to me.'%K%P
'What did you get?'%K%P
'They're all just good people, who actually\ncare about me.'%K%P
'But I caused all kinds of trouble for them,\nwith my temper and my selfishness.'%K%P
'Maybe. The old Akane might have been like that.'%K%P
I agreed quietly.%K%P
Right now, Akane was realizing something about\nherself, she didn't need my clumsy support.%K%P
'I'm an Aragami, but I want to use my\nJinriki to help people.'%K%P
'There are people who care for me,\nso I want to care for them.'%K%P
'You can do that. I know you can.\nYou've already started by noticing them.'%K%P
Akane gripped my arm tightly.%K%P
'Thank you. It's all because of you.'%K%P
'I just lent a hand. This is just more proof\nof you growing up.'%K%P
'But you're the one who's been the nicest to me.'%K%P
'Of course! I'm your boyfriend, aren't I?'%K%P
As we approached Tsubaki Apartments, arms entwined,\nour footsteps slowed of their own accord.%K%P
'We're back!'%K%P
'Welcome home!'%K%P
'Welcome home, the both of you.'%K%P
They greeted us as we came into the\nliving room, still arm-in-arm.%K%P
'It looks like you two had fun on your date!'%K%P
'Of course! I never dreamed it would be so much fun!'%K%P
'Sho did a proper job of showing you around, huh?\nWhere'd you go?'%K%P
'Well...'%K%P
Akane excitedly told Maika about our date.%K%P
'Pardon me, Sho?'%K%P
While I was watching the two of them talking\nand laughing, Inori called out to me, a strange\nlook on her face.%K%P
'What's wrong?'%K%P
'There's something I need to discuss with you two.\nIf I come to your room later, will you two wait for\nme there?'%K%P
'Yes, of course.'%K%P
'Thank you very much. Well then, I'll retire\nfor now.'%K%P
Bowing lightly, she left the living room.%K%P
I wondered what she could have to discuss with us.%K%P
I sat alone, head bowed, pondering what\nit could be.%K%P
